name: For Ambergris
description:
A short linear fantasy visual novel.

Approx 20mins. 1080x720. Age Rating 16+ for strong language.

After work one day Jamie recieves a request for photography services from a mysterious character. The proposition is rather odd seeing as Jamie is a warehouse operative working a zero-hour contract and by no means a professional photographer.

Music: The intro track is by me, Paradigm Shifty and the other 5 tracks are by Urban Fox. (urbanfox.bandcamp.com)

Made in Ren'Py VN engine for SuNoFes game jam in about 5 weeks.

Android version out now!

Accessibility version out now (v1.9). In this you can choose to play regular mode or the mode that is optimised for using the self-voicing feature (which can be toggled on and off using the V key). To get started you can use the arrow keys and enter to navigate the menu.

I greatly appreciate any feedback :)

Twitter: @sleepyagents
